fields.title: Tutorial ‚Äì Setting up the server
fields.description: Lean how to set up the Dossier server in the backend.

children.text: Have a working Dossier server in the backend.
In order to interact with the database we need a server.
The main thing we need to provide to the server is the database adapter. We also need to provide an authorization adapter, for now we'll go with a standard
. After the server is initialized we install a plugin (
) that will validate and index entities in the background when the schema is modified.
To prepare for talking to the server we also initialize an admin client for an
The server takes ownership of the database adapter, and when we're done with the server we need to call
so it can disconnect from the database. We also want to disconnect all connections to the HTTP server when shutting down the backend. In
Now when we make changes to the backend, we will get a log like this when
[be] info: Received signal SIGUSR2, shutting down
[be] info: No schema set, defaulting to empty
